schema:creator: Long, J.D.
schema:description: Adobe block construction. San Juan Capistrano ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826a)) Reconstruction work and old stone church, ([b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826b)) Remains of original walls and arches. San Luis Rey ([c](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826c)) Remains of outer walls standing without protection in semi-decay. San Miguel - main part has stood without restoration. ([d](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826d)) Main edifice from rear, ([e](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826e)) from rear across court yard, ([f](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826f)) Walls soon go down without roof protection, ([g](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1826g)) Showing method of forming openings in court yard wall.
schema:keywords: .1 Materials, manufacture, tests, strength, preservation, etc
schema:name: Old Mission Remains, San Juan Capistrano, San Luis Rey (Oceanside), San Miguel (f)
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
